values: Jesus Came into the World to Bear Witness to the TruthJesus Came into the World to Bear Witness to the Truth

Realize how much is at stake in the Jesus' claim to bring the truth. It is a matter of eternal life an death. Your life is on the line.Realize how much is at stake in the Jesus' claim to bring the truth. It is a matter of eternal life an death. Your life is on the line.
